scripts.compile-ext: yarn --cwd packages/core run prompts:bundle && yarn --cwd packages/vscode run compile
scripts.typecheck: yarn --cwd packages/core run typecheck && yarn --cwd packages/vscode run typecheck && yarn --cwd packages/cli run typecheck
scripts.package: cd packages/vscode && yarn package:insiders && yarn package
scripts.commit-versions: git add packages/**/package.json && git commit -m '[skip ci] updated version numbers' && git push
scripts.release: yarn typecheck && yarn compile && yarn package && yarn release:draft && yarn patch-versions && yarn compile && yarn package && yarn release:vsix && yarn commit-versions
scripts.test:cli: node packages/cli/built/gptools.js run code-annotator packages/sample/src/counting.py -l Test -d -o .gptools/tmp/tests/cli -ot .gptools/tmp/tests/cli/outtrace.md -oa .gptools/tmp/tests/cli/diags.csv
scripts.test:live: node packages/cli/built/gptools.js run code-annotator packages/sample/src/counting.py -l Test -o .gptools/tmp/tests/cli --retry 1 --temperature 0.5 --no-cache
